programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: The Hero Academy battles the dragons without Anos' help. Meanwhile, Lay and Misa are being captured by Licius…. At the Underground World, Anos learns that Ahide is controlling the Dragonmen.

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: Anos and Ahide clash. Ahide possesses Arcana and drops the trial of the Sword of the Omnipotent upon Anos. Ahide can be killed with the sword, but the wielder's source will be destroyed…

programme.title: Migi & Dali
programme.desc: To find the room where they lived with their mother, Migi and Dali join the Boy Scouts and try to make friends who will invite them to their homes, but an obstacle awaits.

programme.title: Migi & Dali
programme.desc: Migi and Dali start attending school in order to become friends with Eiji. To achieve their goal, they need to get good grades. They begin to study hard, but the unexpected occurs.

programme.title: takt op. Destiny
programme.desc: Takt and the others travel into the wilderness. Amidst a D2 attack, First Seat Commander “Shindler,” and his 2 Musicarts emerge from the railroad.

programme.title: takt op. Destiny
programme.desc: Takt and the others stop by a town, and Anna and Destiny help out the townspeople. Meanwhile, Takt hears “music” coming from an old bar.

programme.title: THE iDOLM@STER SHINYCOLORS
programme.desc: 283 Production's performance at "W.I.N.G." has been decided. Taking this opportunity, the producer proposes a task to the idols—to personally document their preparation process for W.I.N.G.

programme.title: THE iDOLM@STER SHINYCOLORS
programme.desc: After W.I.N.G., the idols of 283 Production go through their documentary and reflect on their efforts and results and determine what they should do in the future.

programme.desc: To promote Heart Tart, Chika and Yumiko appear on Mekuru's radio show, where Yumiko is impressed by Mekuru's skills, despite her harsh remarks. However, something about Mekuru seems off…

programme.desc: Yuhi and Yasumi host a radio programme as a close-knit voice actor and classmate duo. But the truth is, they're complete opposites who hate each other! What awaits in their difficult path?

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Shea, Hajime and Yue head towards the Reisen Gorge, where a rumoured labyrinth lies within. They begin their exploration, but after overcoming the obstacles, something enormous awaits…

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Hajime arrives at Fuhren, where he receives a search request from the Adventurer Guild. Stopping by the lakeside town of Ur, he unexpectedly reunites with his classmates…

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: In order to search for the missing adventure, Hajime's party, his classmates and Aiko Sensei head towards the northern mountain range. One night, a giant black dragon appears…

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Hajime learns that monsters are heading to the Town of Ur. While preparing to fight off the horde, Hajime introduces Aiko as the Goddess of Fertility, raising the citizens' morale…

programme.title: Skip and Loafer
programme.desc: Announcement for the topics covered in the first term final exams is happening soon. Mitsumi's fully prepared for what is to come, but…

programme.title: Skip and Loafer
programme.desc: Mitsumi is nominated as the student council's secretary. Takamine-senpai loses and becomes vice-president. Looking at how defeated Takamine-senpai is, Kanechika-senpai comes up with an idea.

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants

programme.title: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
programme.desc: Sariphi struggles with her first task as the queen's representative due to the Queen of Sabre, Karkala's interference. Just then, the Fourth Princess, Tetra, appears with a solution.

programme.title: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
programme.desc: Leonhart is unable to accompany Sariphi on her next task as queen's representative. While putting together a personal guard for Sariphi, one demonfolk steps up and volunteers himself.

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
programme.desc: After failing her infiltration, Foll freeloads in Zagan's castle. Zagan brings her to Marchosias's castle, where they learn something new about the Archdemon seals and Twelve Holy Swords…

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
programme.desc: The slow-moving but heart-fluttering romcom between Zagan, a socially inept and foul-mouthed sorcerer, and Nephy, a beautiful white-haired elf girl from an underground auction, begins!

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND Season 2
programme.desc: With Mujika and Sonju's guidance, Emma and the children learn the ways of survival. To reach “B06-32”, they trek through a wasteland but find nothing upon reaching there.

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND Season 2
programme.desc: The telephone suddenly rings. It's a pre-recorded call from William Minerva. Through the recording, the children learn about the truth. Meanwhile, Isabella is offered a chance at freedom.

programme.title: The Many Sides of Voice Actor Radio
programme.desc: Yuhi and Yasumi host a radio programme as a close-knit voice actor and classmate duo. But the truth is, they're complete opposites who hate each other! What awaits in their difficult path?

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: The team traveling to the past to meet Tsade gather at the manor, where Sein and Walter learn about Tsade's ability and its meaning. Meanwhile, a girls' night is happening at Alice's room.

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: Bocchan finally meets the witch who cursed him—Tsade. Alice's mother, Sharon, awakens from her eternal slumber. The story between Bocchan and Alice finally reaches a conclusion...!

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: The group arrives at Atami. Trying to give Shozo and Ine alone time, Mino and Shota end up sharing a room. The next day, Shozo turns old again, but enjoys his time at the beach with Ine.

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: Shozo and Ine, an old loving couple, return to their youth after eating a mysterious apple! While spending their days being close like always, the lovebirds are more energetic than before...!

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: Anos and Ahide clash. Ahide possesses Arcana and drops the trial of the Sword of the Omnipotent upon Anos. Ahide can be killed with the sword, but the wielder's source will be destroyed…

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] 2nd SEASON -The Eve of Awakening-
programme.desc: Iroha and Madoka's party struggle to fight their friends Tsuruno and Mami, who are now under Magius' control. Meanwhile, a large supercell is approaching and its true form is the Walpurgis Night.

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] 2nd SEASON -The Eve of Awakening-
programme.desc: After Iroha and the others defeat Tsuruno, Toka drives her anger towards them. Iroha wakes up in an unfamiliar world and remembers the past.

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] FINAL SEASON -Dawn of a Shallow Dream-
programme.desc: The final season of the MAGIA RECORD SERIES. What conclusion awaits all the Magical Girls who continue to fight for each of their wishes…?

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND Season 2
programme.desc: The telephone suddenly rings. It's a pre-recorded call from William Minerva. Through the recording, the children learn about the truth. Meanwhile, Isabella is offered a chance at freedom.

programme.title: The Many Sides of Voice Actor Radio
programme.desc: Yuhi and Yasumi host a radio programme as a close-knit voice actor and classmate duo. But the truth is, they're complete opposites who hate each other! What awaits in their difficult path?

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: The team traveling to the past to meet Tsade gather at the manor, where Sein and Walter learn about Tsade's ability and its meaning. Meanwhile, a girls' night is happening at Alice's room.

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: Bocchan finally meets the witch who cursed him—Tsade. Alice's mother, Sharon, awakens from her eternal slumber. The story between Bocchan and Alice finally reaches a conclusion...!

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: The group arrives at Atami. Trying to give Shozo and Ine alone time, Mino and Shota end up sharing a room. The next day, Shozo turns old again, but enjoys his time at the beach with Ine.

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: Shozo and Ine, an old loving couple, return to their youth after eating a mysterious apple! While spending their days being close like always, the lovebirds are more energetic than before...!

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: Anos and Ahide clash. Ahide possesses Arcana and drops the trial of the Sword of the Omnipotent upon Anos. Ahide can be killed with the sword, but the wielder's source will be destroyed…

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] 2nd SEASON -The Eve of Awakening-
programme.desc: Iroha and Madoka's party struggle to fight their friends Tsuruno and Mami, who are now under Magius' control. Meanwhile, a large supercell is approaching and its true form is the Walpurgis Night.

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] 2nd SEASON -The Eve of Awakening-
programme.desc: After Iroha and the others defeat Tsuruno, Toka drives her anger towards them. Iroha wakes up in an unfamiliar world and remembers the past.

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] FINAL SEASON -Dawn of a Shallow Dream-
programme.desc: The final season of the MAGIA RECORD SERIES. What conclusion awaits all the Magical Girls who continue to fight for each of their wishes…?

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] FINAL SEASON -Dawn of a Shallow Dream-
programme.desc: The final season of the MAGIA RECORD SERIES. What conclusion awaits all the Magical Girls who continue to fight for each of their wishes…?

programme.title: BACK ARROW
programme.desc: Atlee has been chosen to be king of the Grand Edger Fort Ship Nation. Meanwhile, Noble Rudolf begins his new plan.

programme.title: BACK ARROW
programme.desc: Emperor Zetsu stops Tae Howa from gaining power over Rekka. Peath, under Noble Rudolf's order, attacks the Grand Edger.

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
programme.desc: After failing her infiltration, Foll freeloads in Zagan's castle. Zagan brings her to Marchosias's castle, where they learn something new about the Archdemon seals and Twelve Holy Swords…

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
programme.desc: The slow-moving but heart-fluttering romcom between Zagan, a socially inept and foul-mouthed sorcerer, and Nephy, a beautiful white-haired elf girl from an underground auction, begins!

programme.title: THE iDOLM@STER SHINYCOLORS
programme.desc: After W.I.N.G., the idols of 283 Production go through their documentary and reflect on their efforts and results and determine what they should do in the future.

programme.title: THE iDOLM@STER SHINYCOLORS
programme.desc: 283 Production announces its first live performance featuring all groups. Amid rising anticipation and busy schedules, the idols of 283 Production come together and prepare for the event.

programme.title: Prima Doll
programme.desc: Hokiboshi is an automaton that is unable to speak. She cannot be fixed despite undergoing maintenance, and Haizakura is worried. It seems that she had been broken due to an incident that occurred in battle. Just then, news reaches Hokiboshi. The 525th Regiment, which Hokiboshi was a member of, returns victorious…

programme.title: Prima Doll
programme.desc: Haizakura and Hokiboshi's musical shows have been well received, and Kuronekotei's sales are rising. Although their leader, Karasuba, is happy about this, she harbors some complex emotions. She is invited to sing together, but she hesitates. However, with a push from Nagi and the other dolls, she becomes more positive. Just then, another doll goes on a rampage in the imperial capital…

programme.title: Blood Blockade Battlefront
programme.desc: Leo, Zapp and Zed's lunch time turn to the bizarre when they come into several restaurants, one weirder than the other, until they are dragged to a heated battle along Klaus and Steven.

programme.title: Blood Blockade Battlefront
programme.desc: As the origins of White and her brother are revealed, the King of Despair uses the power of Leo's eyes to ignite a huge catastrophe on Hellsalem's Lot during Halloween.

programme.title: Blood Blockade Battlefront

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: The second school term begins. Tomozaki begins to take interest in his surroundings while Aoi brings up the next task. How will Tomozaki deal with the girl on the top of the class hierarchy?

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: With Aoi, Yuzu, and Mizusawa's help, Tomozaki succeeds at getting Erika motivated on sports day. While he immerses himself in the positive vibes in class, Erika is up to something bad…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Hanabi becomes Erika's new bullying target. Their arguments persist as their classmates grow tired of Hanabi's obliviousness. With Tomozaki's advice, Hanabi attempts to change herself…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Tomozaki proposes for Hanabi to blend in better with their classmates. Hanabi shows some improvement with Mizusawa, Takei and Fuka's help. Meanwhile, Aoi doesn't wish for Hanabi to change…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Hanabi reaches a breaking point after seeing her keychain being damaged. Later, Erika finds her desk toppled. The mood turns dark, and Tomozaki realizes that someone is manipulating it…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Tomozaki asks Aoi about what she did to Erika. While Tomozaki remains unsettled about Aoi's decision to exact revenge, peace returns and preparation for the cultural festival is underway.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Tomozaki proposes an original play for the cultural festival and is made the director. While working on Aoi's assignment to take photos with everyone, Tomozaki invites Mimimi to a meal.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Mizusawa and Tomozaki go to an all-girls school cultural festival. Tomozaki is impressed by Mizusawa's social skill. While being asked about himself, Tomozaki replies pessimistically…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Hesitant about Mimimi's confession, Tomozaki thinks pessimistically, but Mizusawa offers him advice. Aoi presses Tomozaki to give an answer, and he names the two girls he is interested in…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Hesitant about Mimimi's confession, Tomozaki thinks pessimistically, but Mizusawa offers him advice. Aoi presses Tomozaki to give an answer, and he names the two girls he is interested in…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: The cast for the play is decided. Tomozaki and Mimimi decide to face their feelings head-on. While going through the revised script, Tomozaki and Fuuka get stuck at the character, Alcia.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Rehearsals for the play begin. Through the play, Fuuka attempts to change herself. Meanwhile, Tomozaki prepares for the comedy act. Fuuka finishes the story's ending, but it is unexpected.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Fuuka chose a sad ending for the play. After talking to Tomozaki about what he did in the past six months, she tries to write a new ending. The cultural festival begins.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: The stage play begins. As the story reaches its climax, a scene Tomozaki is unaware of, featuring "A letter from Chris", begins. That is none other than, a message from Fuuka to Tomozaki...

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Shea, Hajime and Yue head towards the Reisen Gorge, where a rumoured labyrinth lies within. They begin their exploration, but after overcoming the obstacles, something enormous awaits…

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Hajime arrives at Fuhren, where he receives a search request from the Adventurer Guild. Stopping by the lakeside town of Ur, he unexpectedly reunites with his classmates…

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: In order to search for the missing adventure, Hajime's party, his classmates and Aiko Sensei head towards the northern mountain range. One night, a giant black dragon appears…

programme.title: ARIFURETA: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Hajime learns that monsters are heading to the Town of Ur. While preparing to fight off the horde, Hajime introduces Aiko as the Goddess of Fertility, raising the citizens' morale…

programme.desc: Momose and Shirosaki head to a hot spring inn, while Aoyama and Kinjo go to a day trip to "Kumatte Land". It begins to rain heavily when Aoyama and Kinjo return, and Kinjo catches a cold.

programme.title: Kemono Michi: Rise Up
programme.desc: After Kemona Mask disappears amidst their match, MAO falls into depression. Shigure wants Genzo to clear some quests but the man wants nothing but to frolic with his pets at home.

programme.title: Kemono Michi: Rise Up
programme.desc: MAO is summoned to another world by Joanna. In the past, Joanna's servant, Rose, once defeated Camilla which resulted in Hanako having to suffer from a humiliating treatment…

programme.title: Bungo Stray Dogs Season 5
programme.desc: Atsushi agrees to let Teruko meet Ranpo, but something seems off. Meanwhile, Sigma has had enough of Dazai, who doesn't seem to be interested in escaping the prison.

programme.title: Bungo Stray Dogs Season 5
programme.desc: The members of the Agency become hostages one by one. However, Fukuzawa is now clear that Fukuchi's motive is not the country's destruction.

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World
programme.desc: Tensions are rising between the Empire and the Nebulis Sovereignty with the emergence of a Vortex. Alice suspects that Marquess Mask is trying monopolize all the astral energy.

programme.title: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World
programme.desc: When Alice cannot get Iska off her mind, Rin suggests they meet to settle things once and for all. Meanwhile, Iska's party receives a high-level order to infiltrate the Nebulis Sovereignty.

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: The team traveling to the past to meet Tsade gather at the manor, where Sein and Walter learn about Tsade's ability and its meaning. Meanwhile, a girls' night is happening at Alice's room.

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: Bocchan finally meets the witch who cursed him—Tsade. Alice's mother, Sharon, awakens from her eternal slumber. The story between Bocchan and Alice finally reaches a conclusion...!

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: The group arrives at Atami. Trying to give Shozo and Ine alone time, Mino and Shota end up sharing a room. The next day, Shozo turns old again, but enjoys his time at the beach with Ine.

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: Shozo and Ine, an old loving couple, return to their youth after eating a mysterious apple! While spending their days being close like always, the lovebirds are more energetic than before...!

programme.title: Fire Force Season 2
programme.desc: Shinra makes an important discovery about how to fight Charon, but incorporating a new hand form into his fighting style proves difficult.

programme.title: Fire Force Season 2
programme.desc: Inca is faced with the decision of whether to go with Shinra and the Fire Force, or to go with Charon and side with the Evangelist. The 8th launches a research expedition to find answers.

programme.title: Snow Dogs: Into the Wild
programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog.

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp (S2)
programme.desc: Joel and Nish travel to Tokyo to meet Japan's professional sumo wrestlers before heading to the remote Oki Islands to take part in a tournament in the birthplace of Sumo.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S11)
programme.desc: With summer nearing its end, Alaskans kick into high gear.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5)
programme.desc: Melt-in-your-mouth chocolate mints are lovingly finished by hand. In a unique antipasto, the star ingredient goes from field to jar all on the same day; Aussie-style soft licorice owes its success to a blunder Down Under; and find out the secret to making perfectly seasoned plantain chips.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5)
programme.desc: Peanut butter cups feature an amazing history and a one-of-a-kind butterscotch coating; starting with giant slabs of butter, three million Sara Lee pound cakes are produced every year; three types of citrus go from tree to jar at this Florida orchard; and a butter chicken cooking sauce is made at a university research facility.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle (S10)
programme.desc: Ben stays with Naveen and Anke who have made their home in the Sri Lanka's highlands. He uncovers why they swapped one of the biggest cities in the world for a simple off-grid existence miles from civilisation.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka (S1)
programme.desc: The presenter takes a train ride into tea country to find out about Ceylon tea. Xander also meets a master Kandyan dancer to learn about Kandy city's annual procession.

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World (S1)
programme.desc: As the teams approach the halfway point, they must navigate their way from the Mediterranean island of Corsica to the third checkpoint in Zermatt, a mountain resort nestled in the Swiss Alps.

programme.title: Big Little Journeys (S1)

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S11)
programme.desc: With summer nearing its end, Alaskans kick into high gear.

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp (S2)
programme.desc: Joel and Nish travel to Tokyo to meet Japan's professional sumo wrestlers before heading to the remote Oki Islands to take part in a tournament in the birthplace of Sumo.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life (S2)
programme.desc: Hannah gains access to a top-secret site where anonymous staff and the latest tech work to make the British passport one of the most secure documents on the planet.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3)

programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog.

programme.desc: See artisan chocolatiers turn liquid into luscious raspberry creams; tons of bagel crisps roll off a North Carolina assembly line every year; and find out how science and sunshine are mixed to create yellow food colouring.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5)
programme.desc: Visit the historic Michigan home of Alphabits cereal; the secret to a jet-black fettuccine is 3 litres of squid ink; every jar of a zesty garden mix is artfully packed by hand; and an Indiana candy factory produces more than 50 million gummy peaches per week.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5)
programme.desc: Once discontinued, the strawberry cheesecake frozen treat is back by popular demand; find out the secret to irresistible sea salt caramels; allergen-free bars pack all the satisfaction of a cinnamon bun; and a Toronto duo has put a modern twist on a Jewish culinary classic.

programme.title: Blue Planet II (S2)
programme.desc: A ground-breaking journey to the Deep, our final frontier and home to real-life aliens; from monstrous sharks to shrimps in glass cages and perhaps the origin of all life on Earth.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka (S1)
programme.desc: Xander has a close-up encounter with a cobra, and travels north to Tamil country where he helps dig up mines remaining after the bitter civil war that raged for 30 years.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1)
programme.desc: A look at the Port Building, a stunning, gravity-defying office complex building that appears to hover over a 19th-century fire station, and uses a borehole energy system that makes it one of the most energy efficient buildings in Europe.

programme.desc: Martin travels to Papua New Guinea and lives amongst the subsistence farmers of the Trobriand Islands. There, he plays their favourite game - cricket! programme.title: Clean It, Fix It S3 - EP 9
programme.desc: Master builder and household favourite Tommy Walsh is joined by expert pro cleaner Maxine Dwyer and creative carpenter Asher Edwards, as they meet people across the UK who are struggling with household chaos, grime and clutter. Much more than a makeover show, our dynamic professionals provide real-life, practical solutions, invaluable tips and insider tricks to give viewers brilliant take-away ideas for bettering their own living spaces.

programme.title: Mat Yoyo: The New Generation - EP 14
programme.desc: Kim sets a few puzzles for Yoyo, Yaya and the audience to solve. The answers are all about shapes. Then they become shape detectives and attempt to spot the hidden shapes in the pictures that Kim shows them. Why segment - Why are wheels round? Yoyo and Yaya wonder why wheels have to be round and not some other shape. Kim conducts and experiment to show them why wheels that are round are the most efficient and effective. ..

programme.title: In Our House S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: IN OUR HOUSE is full of surprises and is more interactive and energetic than you have ever seen before. In an entertaining mix of song, dance, music and drama, join the wacky hosts as they introduce the LETTERS AND NUMBERS OF THE DAY and the adventures that they encounter.

programme.title: The Big Q S4 - EP 2
programme.desc: The Big Q S4 - EP 2

programme.title: Zoo TV - EP 4
programme.desc: The serious showcases Singapore Zoo and it's animals, with each episode focusing on a specific genre ie: predators. The series looks at the different species of predators in the zoo, shares interesting information about specific animals and highlights endangered species.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories - EP 86
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Kai, Lola, Rammy and Bobbi are four heroic young deer that protect the animals who live in Central Forest and the people living in Platinum City.

programme.title: The Great Warrior Wall - EP 31
programme.desc: This exciting series follows the life of Seya Wolf on his quest to become a hero. On his way, he encounters friends that accompany him on his journey, and foes who force him into battles.

programme.title: Pokemon Ultimate Journeys: The Series S25 - EP 42
programme.desc: The stakes are higher than ever for Ash, Goh, and Chloe as they advance toward their goals! As the Pokemon World Coronation Series tournament heats up, intensive training is in store for Ash, Pikachu, and their Pokemon friends.

programme.title: My Buddy Bonemasher - EP 10
programme.desc: As Iz's wrestling classmates prepare for the wrestling event, he is stuck at home, grounded and bored. Much to his surprise, his Nenek said that his mum has changed her mind and he can go after all. But when it's time to go on, Iz has doubts and doesn't think he can do it without Bonemasher's help but there's another problem. Sharon was unaware that Iz was going to wrestle!

programme.title: The Muscleteers - EP 1
programme.desc: Follows four daring rodents - two mice, a rat and a hamster - who band together to help those in need and fight crime in the Harbor district!

programme.title: The Muscleteers - EP 2
programme.desc: Follows four daring rodents - two mice, a rat and a hamster - who band together to help those in need and fight crime in the Harbor district!

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven Ares - EP 20
programme.desc: When an elite group of soccer players split up to join teams across the country, the group's forward joins an underdog team from a remote island to help it achieve victory in a youth tournament.

programme.title: Ultraman Z - EP 14
programme.desc: Ultraman Z, the newest addition to the Intergalactic Defense Force, battles with evil forces that spread across the universe. He goes after the monster Genegarg to save Earth from destruction.

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: A suburban family moves to a new neighborhood with their large, yet lovable Great Dane, who has a tendency to wreak havoc in his own oblivious way.

programme.title: The Fixies S3 - EP 37
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them! Luckily for Tom Thomas, the Fixies have the smarts, skills, and tools they need to figure out a problem and solve it before his parents find out.

programme.title: Groom My Room Too S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Move over adults! It's time for kids to have their own makeover series! In Groom My Room Too, catch kids as they take charge and make their dream bedrooms a reality! Each week, one lucky kid gets to transform their room from bland to grand! But it won't be easy! Kids will have to come up with their room designs, ship, decorate and lead their room groomers to finish the makeover on time and on budget!

programme.title: Monster Jam - EP 5
programme.desc: Professional monster truck drivers compete against each other in races and freestyle competitions around the world to win the top prize.

programme.title: World Sailing Show - EP 4
programme.desc: The World Sailing Show is the official international sailing series of the sailing federation World Sailing and is a monthly digest of everything that matters in the sport. From Olympic sailing to the round the world races and the America's Cup, the show includes personality profiles of the top players and technical features from the cutting edge of the sport where the access provided behind the scenes at major events is unparalleled

programme.title: Survivor 46 - EP 7
programme.desc: 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S23 - EP 9
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Citi Para Swimming World Series Singapore 2024 - EP 1
programme.desc: Catch the highlights of the three-day Citi Para Swimming World Series, a prestigious international swimming competition for elite para swimmers. The 2024 World Series will take place in 9 countries, across 4 continents and Singapore will be the only Asian stop from May 17-19. Look out for Team SG para athletes like Yip Pin Xu and Toh Wei Soong in action.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 857
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Snow White And The Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: News Tonight - EP 55
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: The Emirates FA Cup 2023-24 Final: Manchester City vs Manchester United - EP 3
programme.desc: (Live) The 2023-24 FA Cup is the 143rd season of the Football Association Challenge Cup, the oldest football tournament in the world. The FA Cup is a knockout competition with 124 teams taking part from the first round proper while all trying to reach the final at Wembley Stadium on 25 May 2024

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 857
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Planet Action S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, extraordinary stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters. We'll take you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Ram clashes with Lydia as a medical case becomes personal on the day he is due to attend a lavish wedding. Ruby treats a patient from the UK whose story does not add up, and the experience leaves her wondering where she really belongs.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: Extreme - EP 3
programme.desc: America's Got Talent: Extreme is an American reality television and talent competition series created by Simon Cowell. The series is a spinoff of America's Got Talent that focuses on stunt performers. Showcasing the most outrageous, unique and jaw-dropping acts of enormous scale and magnitude that simply can't be confined to a theater stage.

programme.title: Unbelievable Moments Caught On Camera S6 - EP 1
programme.desc: Voiced by Alexander Armstrong, the programme travels around the globe - meeting the people who filmed these amazing clips to get the stories behind the footage. Unbelievable Moments Caught on Camera features incredible, eye-witness footage shot by members of the public.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S6 - EP 5
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Monster Jam - EP 5
programme.desc: Professional monster truck drivers compete against each other in races and freestyle competitions around the world to win the top prize.

programme.title: Attenborough's Global Adventure - EP 3
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough explores the rise of life on the planet, from the explosion of first life on seabeds hundreds of millions of years ago to life today.

programme.title: Attenborough's Global Adventure - EP 3

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories - EP 87

programme.title: Paula & Pals S2 - EP 15
programme.desc: Billy really wants to build a sandcastle but out of pity, he helps Captain Redbeard to search for a treasure even though he doesn't want to.

programme.title: Paula & Pals S2 - EP 16
programme.desc: Tim is obsessed with finding a rare bird in the jungle, instead of enjoying the experience with his friends.

programme.title: Marblegen - EP 26
programme.desc: In a world where marble play has become one of the most popular sports, Marblegens tournaments, magical marbles with extraordinary powers, are all the rage. Forming the Meteor team, Assa, Cosmo, Luna and Sam decided to participate in the Olympia MARBLEGAMES, one of the biggest tournaments on the planet! Their objective: to prevent the terrible Marcellus King from seizing the powerful Mercury ball, a reward offered to the winners.

programme.title: Mondo Yan - EP 1
programme.desc: The world has fallen into chaos and is now a stinky land of toxic cesspools and monstrous mutants, called the Chou World, run by the nasty villain Negu. High above, on top of ancient abandoned skyscrapers, a beautiful new yet fragile and harmonious world has risen: the Yan World. Protected by three eccentric Elders, three young apprentice misfits have been chosen to learn their secrets and protect this peaceful and idyllic place!

programme.title: Supermart Science - EP 1
programme.desc: The supermarket. Do you you know its the source of invigorating, refreshing and exciting science experiments? Supermart Science is a weekly science challenge for children. Presented by 2 zany characters, Helix and Atom Adam, this series makes science experiments, fun, easy and accessible. Using day to day household items that may be found easily at the local supermart, each week, 2 teams face off to shop and build their science challenge. Who will reign supreme?

programme.desc: The unique and quirky gang of Fuse, Newt, Pogo, Bubbles, Jeff, Zee and Slick laugh, trick and trip their way through life.

programme.desc: Ultraman Z, the newest addition to the Intergalactic Defense Force, battles with evil forces that spread across the universe. He goes after the monster Genegarg to save Earth from destruction.

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

programme.title: Groom My Room Too S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Move over adults! It's time for kids to have their own makeover series! In Groom My Room Too, catch kids as they take charge and make their dream bedrooms a reality! Each week, one lucky kid gets to transform their room from bland to grand! But it won't be easy! Kids will have to come up with their room designs, ship, decorate and lead their room groomers to finish the makeover on time and on budget!

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 857
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Singapore Recipes For Life - EP 1
programme.desc: The hosts are on a hunt for a giant piece of kiam hu. Chef Chris makes his grandma's salted fish achar. The theme of fermentation and claypots - how different cultures use these, unfolds. Kyle meets Kak Ijah who cooks up a "fermented durian curry" called Tempoyak before they meet Steven Low a rhythmic ceramicist who shows them the oldest Kiln in Singapore.

programme.title: Going From Broke S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Dan Rosensweig, CEO of student services business Chegg, meets millennials with big dreams but are swimming in debt. Together, Rosensweig and his team advise and guide the subject of each episode to turn their financial situation around and move toward freedom from debt and student loans.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: In the first episode of this entertaining and insightful series, Giles and Monica fly to the other side of the world to work in one of the world's most luxurious eco resorts on the small island of Tetiaroa in French Polynesia, not too far from Monica's birthplace - Samoa. Here, surrounded by a beautiful coral reef and an abundance of marine life, they both work alongside the staff of the exclusive Brando Resort to serve 5-star luxury to guests paying up to an eye-watering 11,000 per night.

programme.title: Celebrity Wheel Of Fortune S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Various celebrities compete against each other by solving word puzzles in order to win cash prizes that are determined by a spinning wheel.

programme.desc: Kali and her followers may have escaped from the black-maned males, but they are still in danger and can't run forever. Concealed in the short grass nearby is Tamu, a doe-eyed newborn gazelle fawn. He's an easy meal for any predator, and hiding is his best defence, but will he escape the attention of jackals Shavu and Shaba? But the jackals have their own problems. Their pups were evicted from their home by army ants, and they are on a mission to find them.

Luo Shen feels that Chang Er's love for Hou Yi far exceeds hers and thus decides to back out of the love triangle...

programme.title: East Frisian: Fire
programme.desc: Detectives Klaasen and Weller's are finally getting married. But their honeymoon is cut short when a corpse is found in bonfire ashes. As bodies pile up, they chase a serial killer through a town celebrating Easter, unraveling a dark mystery.

programme.title: The Order Of Things
programme.desc: Corrado, a policeman in charge of immigration control, meets a young Somali woman on a field assignment in Libya, who left her war-ravaged country to go to Europe. He finds himself having to make a choice between obeying his orders and saving her life.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: Hard Luck
programme.desc: A family comes to the funeral of their beloved grandfather. After the burial it turns out that the numbers grandfather always bet at the lottery just won big, but the winning ticket was buried with him. The race for the buried ticket begins.

programme.title: My Brothers
programme.desc: In this heart-warming Irish road movie, three young brothers take to the streets in a stolen bakery van to replace their dying father’s watch. Headed for Ballybunion, they are quickly side-tracked by a medley of hilarious mishaps and quirky oddballs.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (1)
programme.desc: A prisoner transfer to Thailand goes horribly wrong for Detectives Mehmet and Mustafa when the pair are kidnapped by a local crime family and Mehmet is forced to break their boss out of prison to save Mustafa’s life.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ward
programme.desc: It is no coincidence that detective Sarah Kohr intervenes when the life-threatening attack on a Chinese businessman in Hamburg completely overwhelms his bodyguards. Sarah knows that her former colleague Lanz was behind it, but she needs to find out why.

programme.title: Mission Dadu
programme.desc: The film is about Chumki, an 11 year old girl who feels that the ultimate way of making her war-veteran grandfather happy is by creating a war.

programme.title: Parents vs Influencers
programme.desc: Philosophy professor Paolo is a single father who finds himself losing his teenage daughter to her social media addiction. His efforts to dissuade her from using social media ironically results in Paolo becoming a social media influencer himself.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: After The Storm
programme.desc: After a celebration in her rural hometown, Karla Petersen is murdered on her way home. Inspector Helen Dorn takes on the case but clashes with local officer Tom Petersen, Karla's brother, who defies warnings to find his sister's killer.

programme.title: 180 Degree Rule
programme.desc: Sara, a schoolteacher from Tehran, is preparing to attend a wedding in northern Iran with her family. When her husband suddenly forbids her from going, she hatches a plan to go in secret. But her choice soon places her on a painful path to atonement.

programme.title: Kuessipan
programme.desc: Growing up together as best friends in an Innu community, Shaniss and Mikuan’s friendship is put to the test when Mikuan falls in love with a white boy and dreams of leaving the reserve they grew up in.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.desc: Public Prosecutor Mehringer has been dealt a tough hand in his case against the Ukrainian arms trafficker Artem Lazarev: his most important witness is supposed to die. Investigator Sarah Kohr helps to stage the witness’ death, but all is not as they seem.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Devil
programme.desc: While driving with her mother, detective Sarah Kohr witnesses a robbery at a gas station and intervenes. After subduing the perpetrator who turns out to be just a 15-year-old, she has to investigate how he was able to get his hand on a live weapon.

programme.title: Toubab
programme.desc: Soon after being released from prison, Babtou gets in trouble with the law again. Facing deportation to his foreign birthplace he’s never been to, he and his friend Dennis are willing to do anything to stay in the only home they've ever known: Frankfurt.

programme.title: Toubab
programme.desc: Soon after being released from prison, Babtou gets in trouble with the law again. Facing deportation to his foreign birthplace he’s never been to, he and his friend Dennis are willing to do anything to stay in the only home they've ever known: Frankfurt.

programme.title: A Summer in Greece
programme.desc: On her first trip as driver, Rieke loses her company’s new coach. Faced with the risk of getting fired, she travels across Greece in search of it. Along the way, she meets the suave Yannis, who’s about to help her in more ways than she’s ever imagined.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ward
programme.desc: It is no coincidence that detective Sarah Kohr intervenes when the life-threatening attack on a Chinese businessman in Hamburg completely overwhelms his bodyguards. Sarah knows that her former colleague Lanz was behind it, but she needs to find out why.

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Helena is a divorced woman who has lost faith in love. Her best friend Ulli persuades her into spending Christmas at a quaint and secluded farm. They meet the charismatic farm owners, Tuure and Unna, and bond over life’s troubles – and silver linings.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.

programme.title: Governance
programme.desc: Renzo, a brilliant and unscrupulous manager is forced to quit his position as general manager of an oil group after an investigation for corruption. Convinced that a young colleague betrayed him, he plots his revenge, but the situation gets out of hand.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: Melissa
programme.desc: A thriller film about a domestically abused 9-year-old girl, Melissa, forming a bond with her captor after being kidnapped.

programme.title: LUV
programme.desc: Set in the Baltimore crime world, a fatherless eleven-year-old boy learns about adulthood when he spends a day with his ex-convict uncle whom he idolizes. He becomes witness to the ugliness of drug dealings and the haunting pain of past mistakes in life.

programme.title: East Frisian: Fire
programme.desc: Detectives Klaasen and Weller's are finally getting married. But their honeymoon is cut short when a corpse is found in bonfire ashes. As bodies pile up, they chase a serial killer through a town celebrating Easter, unraveling a dark mystery.

programme.title: East Of Sweden
programme.desc: Three men share a cabin on a night train – Dominick, an undocumented immigrant, Jere, a criminal and Aleksi, a psychiatric patient. By the night’s end, Aleksi is dead. The surviving two make a dangerous choice that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Welcome At Esposito's
programme.desc: Tonino Esposito is the worst mafia boss that ever walked the earth, but when he finds out that his daughter is dating the son of a public attorney, he finally gets the chance to prove his worth to the family and the whole city of Naples.

programme.title: Hard Luck
programme.desc: A family comes to the funeral of their beloved grandfather. After the burial it turns out that the numbers grandfather always bet at the lottery just won big, but the winning ticket was buried with him. The race for the buried ticket begins.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ward
programme.desc: It is no coincidence that detective Sarah Kohr intervenes when the life-threatening attack on a Chinese businessman in Hamburg completely overwhelms his bodyguards. Sarah knows that her former colleague Lanz was behind it, but she needs to find out why.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: East Frisian: Fire
programme.desc: Detectives Klaasen and Weller's are finally getting married. But their honeymoon is cut short when a corpse is found in bonfire ashes. As bodies pile up, they chase a serial killer through a town celebrating Easter, unraveling a dark mystery.

programme.title: Manta Manta: Legacy
programme.desc: Ex-racer Bertie is facing financial issues with his car repair shop and go-kart track. He plans to participate in an upcoming 90’s race to solve his money problems, but he is suddenly asked by his ex-wife to take care of their son.

programme.title: East Of Sweden
programme.desc: Three men share a cabin on a night train – Dominick, an undocumented immigrant, Jere, a criminal and Aleksi, a psychiatric patient. By the night’s end, Aleksi is dead. The surviving two make a dangerous choice that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: After The Storm
programme.desc: After a celebration in her rural hometown, Karla Petersen is murdered on her way home. Inspector Helen Dorn takes on the case but clashes with local officer Tom Petersen, Karla's brother, who defies warnings to find his sister's killer.

programme.title: Welcome At Esposito's
programme.desc: Tonino Esposito is the worst mafia boss that ever walked the earth, but when he finds out that his daughter is dating the son of a public attorney, he finally gets the chance to prove his worth to the family and the whole city of Naples.

programme.title: 180 Degree Rule
programme.desc: Sara, a schoolteacher from Tehran, is preparing to attend a wedding in northern Iran with her family. When her husband suddenly forbids her from going, she hatches a plan to go in secret. But her choice soon places her on a painful path to atonement.

programme.title: Hard Luck
programme.desc: A family comes to the funeral of their beloved grandfather. After the burial it turns out that the numbers grandfather always bet at the lottery just won big, but the winning ticket was buried with him. The race for the buried ticket begins.

programme.title: A Summer in Iceland
programme.desc: Young Jette flies to Iceland to settle her aunt Rosalie’s ashes in its final resting place. Armed only with Rosalie’s diary, she learns about her aunt’s hidden life of love and survival. Unbeknownst to Jette, her own love story is about to begin too!

programme.title: My Brothers
programme.desc: In this heart-warming Irish road movie, three young brothers take to the streets in a stolen bakery van to replace their dying father’s watch. Headed for Ballybunion, they are quickly side-tracked by a medley of hilarious mishaps and quirky oddballs.

programme.title: Train Driver's Diary
programme.desc: As Ilija nears retirement, his record of unintentional deaths as a train driver weighs heavy. His adopted son, Sima, fears following in his footsteps. But as days pass without incident, Ilija's determination to ensure Sima's success takes a dark turn.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (2)
programme.desc: With his colleague’s life on the line, Inspector Mehmet has to bust Thai crime boss Worawit out of jail. But an ambush by the Red Dragon gang leaves Worawit kidnapped and Mehmet injured and semi-conscious. How will Mehmet save his colleague now?

programme.title: All My Friends Hate Me
programme.desc: Pete is cautiously excited about reuniting with his college crew for a birthday weekend. But, one by one, his friends slowly turn against him. Is he being punished, is he paranoid, or is he part of some sick joke?

programme.title: Manta Manta: Legacy
programme.desc: Ex-racer Bertie is facing financial issues with his car repair shop and go-kart track. He plans to participate in an upcoming 90’s race to solve his money problems, but he is suddenly asked by his ex-wife to take care of their son.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Fresh Produce
programme.desc: Jimmy heads to the bustling Rapid Creek markets, mingling amongst the food stalls, produce growers, and locals out for their weekly shop.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Flavour
programme.desc: Jimmy meets some of the Greek community preparing food for the Greek cultural festival; he visits the colourful Malak Night Market.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Seafood
programme.desc: Jimmy explains why the Top End has some of the country's best and freshest seafood; Jimmy meets self-taught chef Rachael Ciesolka at a Darwin wharf, and learns how to cook her signature lemon citrus mud crab dish.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Contender
programme.desc: This episode explores the young Norma Jeane. While showing talent and audacity, she turned her back on her difficult childhood and put herself on the radar in Hollywood as ‘Marilyn Monroe’.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Siren
programme.desc: This episode explores Marilyn’s defiance about posing nude and how it catapults her to stardom.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Rebel
programme.desc: This episode explores Marilyn’s determination to become a serious actress and her departure from Twentieth Century Fox to start her own production company.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Icon
programme.desc: This episode explores how Marilyn shows her mature talent as an actress and wins a triumphant victory over Twentieth Century Fox shortly before her untimely death.

programme.title: Titans Of Tech - Elon Musk: Superhero Or Supervillain?
programme.desc: Each one-hour documentary utilises rare archive footage and asks fundamental and serious questions about the personalities’ public facade and their businesses.

programme.title: Titans Of Tech - The Billionaires Who Made Our World: Bill Gates
programme.desc: Each one-hour documentary utilises rare archive footage and asks fundamental and serious questions about the personalities’ public facade and their businesses.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Myth & Reality
programme.desc: Dogs in New Zealand can detect human emotions? A pet miniature Schnauzer can predict someone's death? How do dogs really communicate with each other?

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Crucial Hearing
programme.desc: A Jack Russell Terrier barks when he ears the unique sound of a life threatening occurrence. How are dogs trained to provide assistance? Amos, trained by Hearing Dogs for Deaf People UK helps his owner through some difficult times.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Above And Beyond Loyal
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Mystery Of Healing Part 2
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, a Montana native wildlife expert works with wildlife filmmaker René Araneda to capture the wild pumas of Torres del Paine National Park in Chilean Patagonia. Together, they have filmed things seen nowhere else in the world that will unlock the mystery of the puma’s true nature.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Seeing In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Hiding In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Chasing Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Exploring the wilderness and wildlife of the Atlantic Ocean. Winter brings bitter storms, suffering and conflict, while most are battling to survive.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: As winter draws to a close, the Atlantic springs back to life. Fish that spent the winter out in the deeper water have returned. An eagle pair has set up home high above the perfect fishing spot.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer means food is plentiful and this year's youngsters must feed, grow and prepare to start life alone. For puffins it's a massive leap of faith as they jump from their cliff-top nests into the ocean.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: In the Atlantic's far north, autumn is the season of gales, cooling temperatures and driving rain. This is when the wildlife must make the final preparations for winter or migrate to warmer climes.

programme.title: Seal Dog
programme.desc: On the surface, they appear to be ordinary dogs, but these canines have a secret identity. They are the Pentagon's stealth warriors, with specialties in explosives detection, tracking, laser target acquisition and bite work. Meet the U.S. Navy SEALs' latest recruits, four-footed soldiers called to duty to save soldiers' lives. SEAL Dog is an intimate look at one of these astonishing animals, Chopper, his partner, American war hero Trevor Maroshek, and the unbreakable bond they formed, on and off the battlefield.

programme.title: The Last Buffalo
programme.desc: The remarkable story of the near extinction and rescue of the American Bison through the eyes of William T Hornaday.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP15
programme.desc: Starting in Tampa, at Ulele, a rustic chic restaurant with native Floridian fare, is named after a Native American princess. We then head to Orlando where we experience a mouth watering meal at a plant-based deli cafe, Market On South.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP16
programme.desc: We visit Seattle to try a seafood restaurant with an amazing view of the city, then head to Portland to try some genuine Russian food, with a Portland legend. Then back to Seattle to sample some world cuisine.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP17
programme.desc: Kicking off in beautiful Detroit, we meet a local foodie and try some hipster fare. Then off to Cleveland Ohio where we sink our teeth into some amazing barbecue.Then we’ll sample the best chicken and waffles Cleveland has to offer.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP18
programme.desc: Head into the hot American desert to try Cuban food at the magnificent Scott Resort. Then on to the Vegas strip and taste some mouth watering steak. and we eat some magnificent tortilla’s from the back of a food truck.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 - Whanganui
programme.desc: Ben is in Whanganui where he goes hunting with All Black legend Glenn Osborne before visiting Woodhaven Gardens.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 - Southland
programme.desc: This week, Ben is in Southland where he visits Granity Downs then tries to perfect the art of making Cheese Rolls.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 - Auckland
programme.desc: Back in Auckland, Ben fishes for Flounder on the Manukau, learns more about goats and checks out a mushroom farm.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 - Northland
programme.desc: Ben continues the final leg of this journey discovering the wonders of the far north.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Fresh Produce
programme.desc: Jimmy heads to the bustling Rapid Creek markets, mingling amongst the food stalls, produce growers, and locals out for their weekly shop.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Flavour
programme.desc: Jimmy meets some of the Greek community preparing food for the Greek cultural festival; he visits the colourful Malak Night Market.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Seafood
programme.desc: Jimmy explains why the Top End has some of the country's best and freshest seafood; Jimmy meets self-taught chef Rachael Ciesolka at a Darwin wharf, and learns how to cook her signature lemon citrus mud crab dish.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Bush Foods
programme.desc: Jimmy travels to the remote Arnhem Land coastal community of Maningrida to get a taste of food out in the bush.

programme.title: A-Bombs Over Nevada
programme.desc: Contemporary footage is used to capture the extraordinary period in the 1950s and 60s when hundreds of atomic bombs were dropped over the Nevada Test Site. The race to create bigger and better bombs led scientists to push the limits and turned a sleepy desert town into a theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Remembering Vietnam: The Wall At 25
programme.desc: Recall the creation and controversy regarding the Vietnam War Memorial in Washington DC.

programme.title: Aerial America - California
programme.desc: Buckle up for a spectacular flight along the famous Pacific Coast Highway and over iconic landmarks such as Hearst Castle and the Golden Gate Bridge. Soar above beaches and wine country, across Big Sur redwoods, and into the heart of California.

programme.title: Aerial America - Hawaii
programme.desc: Join a non-stop journey over America’s most exotic and breathtaking state. Explore lush green cliffs, black-sand beaches, ancient ruins, and vibrant city life. From Molokai to Maui, discover the astonishing stories of Hawaii's eight major islands.

programme.title: Aerial America - Hawaii
programme.desc: Join a non-stop journey over America’s most exotic and breathtaking state. Explore lush green cliffs, black-sand beaches, ancient ruins, and vibrant city life. From Molokai to Maui, discover the astonishing stories of Hawaii's eight major islands.

programme.title: Aerial America - Amazing Destinations
programme.desc: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures her breathtaking beauty.

programme.title: Adolf Island
programme.desc: See the secret remains of a Nazi concentration camp built on British soil. Follow a world-renowned forensic investigator to Alderney, in the Channel Islands, where she races to uncover evidence before the local government can shut her search down.

programme.title: Aliens Inside US
programme.desc: Every one of us teems with trillions of microorganisms. Some of these microbes are what we call "germs," but many more of them are actually good for us. Discover the health benefits of having aliens inside us, and see how those benefits are being threatened by our modern, sterile lifestyles.

programme.title: Eco Eye - Green With Health
programme.desc: Lara looks at the effects of nature on our well-being, both mentally and physically, before uncovering some interesting connections between the effects of nature and green space on society itself.

programme.title: Eco Eye - State Of Nature
programme.desc: Ireland’s favourite bird and its haunting call are on the brink of extinction. Anja travels across the country to find out what’s caused this collapse and if anything can be done to save it.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Biosphere
programme.desc: Edge of Existence examines existential threats to the worlds biosphere and what it means for the future of the planet, and Aotearoa.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Bio-Threats
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a future where bio-threats present one of the greatest existential risks that humanity has ever faced. From viruses to man-made pandemics and synthetic bio-weapons, technology is accelerating the risks of man-made threats.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a near-future where artificial intelligence rules the planet, and us. AI will arrive in our life-times bringing with it the biggest existential risk humanity has ever faced.

programme.desc: Jimmy heads to the bustling Rapid Creek markets, mingling amongst the food stalls, produce growers, and locals out for their weekly shop.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Flavour
programme.desc: Jimmy meets some of the Greek community preparing food for the Greek cultural festival; he visits the colourful Malak Night Market.

programme.title: Aerial America - Beyond Hollywood
programme.desc: From high in the sky, get a tour of places in the U.S. made famous by Hollywood movies, from superhero hangouts to mobster hideaways.

programme.title: Aerial America - Puerto Rico & The US Virgin Islands
programme.desc: Explore the rich history and stunning natural beauty of Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands from the sky. Surrounded by the sapphire blue sea, these two American territories offer surprises at every turn.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Orangutan Baby Birth
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Two Hooks Turtle
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s vet team commences critical care to save the life of an endangered sea turtle snared on a fishing line, and after 3 years without tigers at the Zoo, the team stand by to welcome a new big cat.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Kiwi Egg Harvest
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Feed The Zoo
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Aerial America - Man Made Marvels
programme.desc: Swoop over America’s biggest, boldest, and most dazzling man-made structures. From the Statue of Liberty to the Seattle Space Needle, these American symbols of creativity rival the vast beauty of the country’s landscape.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Above And Beyond Loyal
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Mystery Of Healing Part 2
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Instinct; The Sixth Sense Part 1
programme.desc: A Staffordshire Bull Terrier Diesel who is able to locate cheetah faecal droppings. Ozzie is one of only three dogs in the world who is trained to detect poisonous Cane Toads.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Critical Sight
programme.desc: How are dogs trained to guide the blind and visually impaired? Border Collies at Johannesburg International Airport are used to chase birds and in Japan, new puppies are born and bred to become guide dogs in future.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Breeding Season
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Rivalry Time
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Rainforest
programme.desc: Rainforests cover just six percent of Earth's surface yet contain almost half of the world's plants and animals. With a diversity of mammals, birds, and bugs unrivaled almost anywhere in the world, Panama's Barro Colorado Island is the perfect microcosm of nature. Every year, passionate and dedicated scientists gather to this oasis of life, scaling the treetops, from canopy to forest floor, in an attempt to unlock the secrets of the rainforest. Follow them as they explore how life thrives in one of the most complex habitats on Earth.

programme.title: Creatures Of The Lagoon
programme.desc: Marine biologists explore Florida’s Indian River Lagoon to discover the secrets of the many fascinating creatures that inhabit it.

programme.title: Sacred Sites - Petra
programme.desc: In Jordan and Saudi Arabia lie the remains of Petra and Hegra, 2,000-year-old cities built by the Nabataeans. New discoveries within their tombs and temples have revealed that women ruled this ancient civilization with unrivalled power for centuries.

programme.title: Take US Home: Leeds United - El Loco
programme.desc: New Leeds United owner Andrea Radrizzani has a mission: To take Leeds United back to the Premier League. But first he must find a new head coach capable of fulfilling the clubs supporters dreams.

programme.title: Take US Home: Leeds United - Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: Leeds United must overcome a mounting injury crisis and show fighting spirit to maintain their challenge for promotion. Fanatical Leeds fan Josh Warrington faces Carl Frampton for IBF World Title.

programme.title: Beyonce & Jay-Z: Power Love
programme.desc: A merger of megastar music. Discover the true story of multi-genre performer and fashion promoter, Beyonce Knowles and the world's first hip hop billionaire, Jay-Z.

programme.title: Adele: A New Chapter
programme.desc: Adele is a 15-time Grammy Award-winning artist whose soulful sound has thrust her into the limelight. Through her own words, video and live performances, take an incredible look at the life and times of one of the greatest artists of all time.

programme.title: Titans Of Tech - The Billionaires Who Made Our World: Jeff Bezos
programme.desc: Each one-hour documentary utilises rare archive footage and asks fundamental and serious questions about the personalities’ public facade and their businesses.

programme.title: Sacred Sites - Templars
programme.desc: During their tumultuous two centuries in power, the Knights Templar were more scandalous than any Hollywood script. Journey into Jerusalem’s Temple Mount, where DNA tests and Vatican discoveries are revealing this secret society’s spectacular fall.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S2 - Jacob Jordaens: Renaissance Watercolours
programme.desc: Behind the scenes at the V&A, a suit from glam rockers Slade needs some TLC, a Michelangelo gives up its secrets and a rare Renaissance watercolour requires urgent attention.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S2 - Epic Iran
programme.desc: Some of the largest paintings ever seen at the V&A are unveiled, Manuel’s costume from Fawlty Towers goes on show, and the museum’s oldest teddy bear has a special visitor.

programme.title: Eco Eye - Climate Change And Me
programme.desc: Lara Dungan speaks with homeowners who have had their coastal residences ruined by erosion and coastal flooding. She’ll meet with experts who outline the bigger picture of climate change.

programme.title: Eco Eye - Seaweed Matters
programme.desc: Anja Murray discovers the amazing variety and ecology of seaweed around Irish coasts. Long harvested by local communities along our west coast, seaweed has now become a valuable resource worldwide.

programme.title: Eco Eye - Climate Friendly Living
programme.desc: Lara learns about her own carbon footprint and how to minimise it. She travels to one of the most sustainable cities in the world, to see lessons about energy, heat, agriculture and transport.

programme.title: Eco Eye - Oceans Of Energy
programme.desc: Lara explores ocean energy and what it means for Ireland’s future. She investigates the latest in Ocean Energy technology and the innovators behind it.

programme.title: Exceptional Engineering S2 - The Plane Makers
programme.desc: Over 16,000 workers and engineers design, produce and deliver industry leading aircraft throughout the European Union at the Airbus factory in Hamburg-Finkenwerder.

programme.title: Exceptional Engineering S2 - Highway Bound
programme.desc: Every ten minutes, a new truck rolls off the assembly line, with a tailor-made production line equipped to cater to individual customer requirements at the Swedish automotive group, Volvo.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP17
programme.desc: Kicking off in beautiful Detroit, we meet a local foodie and try some hipster fare. Then off to Cleveland Ohio where we sink our teeth into some amazing barbecue.Then we’ll sample the best chicken and waffles Cleveland has to offer.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP18
programme.desc: Head into the hot American desert to try Cuban food at the magnificent Scott Resort. Then on to the Vegas strip and taste some mouth watering steak. and we eat some magnificent tortilla’s from the back of a food truck.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP19
programme.desc: We check out what food the Bay Area has to offer, catching up with a local FM morning radio host and try some local fare in Palo Alto and then off to Oakland to visit an American Diner with a Japanese influence.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP20
