programme.desc: Lumpus becomes obsessed with reading Dave and Ping Pong newspaper even though it is 'for campers only'.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 23: Boxing Edward - EP23
programme.desc: Edward can't take another day of Lazlo's antics so he tries to mail himself out of Camp Kidney.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 24: Hold It Lazlo - EP24
programme.desc: After winning a lemonade-drinking contest, Lazlo can't find a place to pee!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 25: Being Edward - EP25
programme.desc: Edward proclaims it 'Edward Day' at camp, expecting everyone to worship him for the day.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 26: Where's Lazlo? - EP26
programme.desc: When Lazlo goes missing from Camp Kidney, a nostalgic Raj and Clam recall life at camp before and after Lazlo arrived.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 01: Valentine's Day - EP1
programme.desc: A Valentine's Card written by Patsy causes havoc throughout Camp Kidney and makes someone very mad -- Patsy's Dad!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 02: A Job Well Dung - EP2
programme.desc: The Dungs have to earn their keep if they want to stay at Camp Kidney. Too bad they're not good at anything.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 03: Award To The Wise - EP3
programme.desc: Award-mania sweeps Camp Kidney and Lazlo just can't keep up.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 04: Cave Chatter - EP4
programme.desc: Samson finally finds someone who will listen to him, the only problem is it's a frozen caveman.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 05: Ed's Benedict - EP5
programme.desc: Edward lays an egg and becomes a proud parent.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 08: Harold & Raj - EP8
programme.desc: Harold tries a little too hard to impress his new best friend, Raj.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 09: Strange Trout From Outer Space - EP9
programme.desc: Three aliens abduct Samson and make his life even more miserable than it already is.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 10: Cheese Orbs - EP10
programme.desc: Three aliens hang out at the Squirrel Scout Camp and come between best friends Patsy and Nina.

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: Steve Carell is Maxwell Smart, a top-secret spy who blunders through every mission with Anne Hathaway, who stars as the sexy Agent 99.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Follow the minion trio as they venture out into the world to find a new evil boss for their brethren to follow.

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: This animated adventure delivers a fresh and funny look at the fable behind the stork legend.

programme.title: Speed Racer
programme.desc: The classic 1960s animated series explodes on the screen in this dazzling live-action adaptation from the makers of The Matrix trilogy.

programme.title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
programme.desc: The adventure about a mustachioed plumber Mario and his lanky brother, Luigi, in their quest to save Princess Peach from villain Bowser.

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer must oversee the construction of green housing development in the Oregon woods. But a furry rebellion, led by a raccoon, stands in the way of his project.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 14: Free Range Foghorn - EP14
programme.desc: Daffy is thrown out of a movie house by Porky the usher, and decides to get revenge by driving Porky crazy.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 15: Love It Or Survivalist It - EP15
programme.desc: Bugs is kidnapped and forced to be "best friend" to spoiled rich kid Paul Perdy. After a difficult afternoon, Bugs tries to show Paul how to be a good friend.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 16: The Porklight - EP16
programme.desc: President Elmer Fudd orders an expedition to explore the great western frontier and to find the Pacific Ocean trail. Who could be better qualified for it than pioneer Porky Pig and guide Daffy Duck?

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 17: Best Bugs - EP17
programme.desc: Daffy stows away on a cruise liner and it's up to Porky to make sure he's not discovered before he wreaks havoc on the ship.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 18: Lewis & Pork - EP18
programme.desc: Superspy Claudette is foiled by Bugs, who accidentally takes her scooter and secret documents with him on his tour of the Italian countryside. Claudette has to get the items back from Bugs.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 19: Daffy The Stowaway - EP19
programme.desc: Porky rents an RV for his cross-country road trip, and picks up a "wounded" Daffy who takes Porky on a ride he never signed up for.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 20: Superscooter 3000 - EP20
programme.desc: Bugs faces Blacque Jacque Shellacque in an old-fashioned lumberjack showdown, and the forest is at stake!

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 21: Hoggin' The Road - EP21
programme.desc: A troupe of boy scouts mistake Bugs for the Easter Bunny, and attempt to capture him by any means neccessary.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 22: Timmmmmmbugs - EP22
programme.desc: It's Easter Sunday, and Granny hires a sitter to watch Tweety while she's out. When the sitter winds up being Sylvester, it's cat versus bird in an Easter showdown.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 23: Easter Bunny Imposter - EP23
programme.desc: Unable to relax in his messy home, Porky orders a hot tub from Daffy Duck. When Daffy himself shows up to install it, he takes Porky's home from cluttered mess to total pig sty.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 24: Easter Tweets - EP24
programme.desc: While delivering pizzas for Squeaks' new business, Bugs is lured into the home of Miss Cougar by the promise of pampering and relaxation. But Miss Cougar is more interested in eating Bugs than pizza.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 25: Hoarder Up - EP25
programme.desc: Daffy crashes a swanky wedding, and it falls to Leslie P. Lillylegs to get rid of the disastrous duck.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 26: Cougar, Cougar - EP26
programme.desc: Ivana hosts a cooking show and unknowingly involves Bugs when she steals his carrots. Bugs sabotages the live show, proving that revenge is a dish best served cold.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 27: The Wedding Quacksher - EP27
programme.desc: Daffy infiltrates the aquarium to get free food, and it's up to aquarium worker Porky to get him out.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 28: The Food Notwork - EP28
programme.desc: Bugs and Squeaks' day of kite flying is disrupted by Boyd the Bird, who falls madly in love with their kite.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 29: A Duck In The Aquarium - EP29
programme.desc: When Bugs and Squeaks discover that Dr. Clovenhoof has built a time machine, the three go on a journey through time at different ages. Beware those awkward teenage years!

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 30: The Breezehammer - EP30
programme.desc: Astronaut Porky is assigned to place a transmitter on Mars, but gets more than he bargains for when Daffy tags along.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 31: Quantum Sheep - EP31
programme.desc: Bugs and Squeaks are hauling a piano in a cross-country road trip when they are sidetracked by corrupt sheriff Yosemite Sam.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 32: Houston, We Have A Duck Problem - EP32
programme.desc: Bugs unintenionally crashes the "World Games," and is forced to go up against an overconfident Calzone. Can Bugs defeat Cal and go for gold?

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 33: 10-4, Good Bunny - EP33
programme.desc: When Leslie P. Lillylegs tries to woo rich widow Granny and steal his money, Bugs decides to foil his plan by giving him terrible romantic advice.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 34: Gold Medal Wabbit - EP34
programme.desc: Spoiled Pampreen Perdy's mansion is up for a neighborhood "Beautification" award. It's up to Porky, her groundskeeper, to keep Daffy Duck from ruining everything.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 35: Cyrano De Bugs - EP35
programme.desc: Sir Littlechin hopes to capture the elusive Kraken, and mistakes Bugs Bunny for the beast. Bugs learns the actual Kraken is a kind-hearted soul, and tries to protect it from Littlechin.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 36: Point Duck Percent - EP36
programme.desc: Zen Master Elmer Fudd sends Porky to escort a sacred pickle to the temple of I-Ate-A-Tomoto. Only one thing stands in his way… Daffy the Ninja.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 37: Sir Littlechin And The Kraken - EP37
programme.desc: Archaelogists Porky and Daffy stumble into the tomb of King Nutininkommen, and have to get out again before the mummy catches up with them.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 38: Crounching Porky, Hidden Daffy - EP38
programme.desc: An angry environmentalist picks the wrong person to stop for a donation when he flags down Foghorn Leghorn.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 39: King Nutininkommen - EP39
programme.desc: Bugs is upset when he sees magician Viktor performing his tricks on a helpless bunny. Bugs agrees to be Viktor's assistant if Viktor lets the bunny go, but Viktor gets more than he bargained for.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 40: Greenhouse Gasbag - EP40
programme.desc: Explorer Ponce De Calzone is searching for the Fountain of Youth. When he enlists Daffy's help, it might be the worst decision he's ever made.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 41: Abracawabbit - EP41

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 42: Ponce De Calzone - EP42
programme.desc: Porky and Daffy are on duty delivering babies to expecting parents. When Baby Jack's parents aren't home, the pair try their hand and parenting until the real parents return.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 43: For The Love Of Fraud - EP43
programme.desc: Bugs is in the middle of an epic cartoon adventure when he and the board artist get into an argument. The star and the artist try and re-boot the cartoon, to mixed results.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 44: Not So Special Delivery - EP44
programme.desc: Daffy Duck can't handle his own celebrity when Elmer turns him into a beloved symbol of the summer season.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 45: One Carroter In Search Of An Artist - EP45
programme.desc: In this all-musical short, Pepe visits a seaside bistro and lays his eyes on Claudette for the first time. It is love at first sight… For the next five minutes or so.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 46: The Duck Days In Summer - EP46
programme.desc: Museum Guide Porky Pig hopes to get a group of Scouts excited about the science musuem. Nothing could go wrong… Until Daffy shows up.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 47: Etiquette Shmetiquette - EP47
programme.desc: Granny and Tweety run a charm school for chickens. When Daffy Duck sees how well the students of the school are eating, he decides to crash his way into the classes.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 48: Daffy In The Science Museum - EP48

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 49: Affair Du Jour - EP49
programme.desc: Captain Blacque Jacque Shellaque is searching the high seas for the mythical Slugsmoby. He gets more trouble than help whe he drafts Bugs Bunny to be his first mate.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 50: Top Bugs - EP50
programme.desc: Bugs attends an MMA match and sees champion fighter Rhoda Roundhouse cheating. When he calls her out, she challenges him to a fight and the match is on.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 51: Slugsmoby - EP51
programme.desc: Viktor is a clown in The Pretentious Circus when his act is ruined by a critical onlooker, Daffy Duck. Daffy goes out of his way to show Viktor what he thinks a circus should be.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 52: Rhoda Rage - EP52

programme.desc: Marvin the Martian is planning an invasion of Earth, but decides he must study a typical Earthling before doing so. Unfortunately for him, the Earthling he chooses is Daffy Duck.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 56: Acme Instant - EP56

programme.desc: Flapjack strives to make Stormalong's most underappreciated comedian feel appreciated...

programme.desc: Meet Flapjack, a young boy who dreams of being a sea adventurer.

programme.desc: K'Nuckles has the perfect plan for scamming the tourist crowd in Stormalong...

programme.desc: Meet Flapjack, a young boy who dreams of being a sea adventurer.

programme.desc: ...turns out it was Flapjack! Which is bad because they take over the town.

programme.desc: Storm a brewin' in Stormalong? "Don't worry!", says K'Nuckles, "this happens every year."

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 27: Super-Villain Team-Up - EP27
programme.desc: After a lull in alien antics, Ben suggests to Max and Gwen that he might be a better hero if he went solo. Vilgax enlists the help of Zombozo to build a giant hypno-mechanism to mesmerise the world.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 28: The Feels - EP28
programme.desc: While Max and Gwen revel in the holiday spirit of Winter Wonderland, Ben couldn't be more unamused and focussed on the toys. The Weatherheads set their sights on Winter Wonderland.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 29: Chicken Nuggets Of Wisdom - EP29
programme.desc: Ben and Max get into an argument and Ben goes Heatblast.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 30: Past Aliens Present - EP30
programme.desc: When Ben stumbles upon a video of Cannonbolt ripping up a computer lab on the internet, Team Tennyson must race to State U to find the imposter. Ben discovers it is a steam-punk version of his alien.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 31: Double Hex - EP31
programme.desc: Gwen and Ben compete to see who can spot more birds first while birdwatching at Pinnacles National Park. A forest fire interrupts their fun and Team Tennyson must hurry to save the bird population.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 32: Ye Olde Laser Duel - EP32
programme.desc: As Team Tennyson admires the efficiency of a modern train station, Ben is quick to sniff out one of Steam Smythe's robots holding up the line. The villain then tricks our hero into accepting a duel.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 33: Ben Again And Again - EP33
programme.desc: Billy Billions' efforts to carve his face onto Mount Rushmore with a laser are upset by Ben. The billionaire brat plots to remove Ben from the Omnitrix, accidentally opening a rift in space-time.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 34: All Koiled Up - EP34
programme.desc: When Ben grows impatient with the snail-like pace of gardening, he goes O-E Overflow to pick up the speed and accidentally floods the community garden.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 35: Dreamtime - EP35
programme.desc: After a series of recurring nightmares affect his sleep, Ben refuses to open up to Max and Gwen about what's bothering him. Before long, they realise Zombozo is behind it.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 36: Innervasion Part 1: Message In A Boxcar - EP36
programme.desc: As Team Tennyson prepares their boxcar for an upcoming race, Ben starts hearing voices and is unable to go Upgrade to enhance his car. Soon after, a mysterious Warbot interrupts the race.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 37: Innervasion Part 2: Call The Dream Police - EP37
programme.desc: After beating the Warbot and finding Vilgax inside, Ben's "secret voices" worsen and begin to affect his sleep. Gwen discovers Ben sleepwalking and using campsite items to create his own Junkbot.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 38: Innervasion Part 3: Strange Bedfellows - EP38
programme.desc: After the Junkbot shoots the Omnitrix and it begins glowing neon-blue, an imprisoned Vilgax explains it is now a gateway through which the Fulmini Empire will invade Earth.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 39: Innervasion Part 4: Mind Over Alien Matter - EP39
programme.desc: While inside the Omnitrix, Ben and Vilgax must work together if they are to close the gateway, but once the Fulmini leader, the High Override, appears, even that might not be enough.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 40: Innervasion Part 5: High Override - EP40
programme.desc: While Ben struggles to avoid the High Override's mind control, Max and Gwen enter the Omnitrix to lend a hand. Once they discover Ben is not who he seems, Max and Gwen must go all out to help him.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 01: Forgeti - EP1
programme.desc: When Gwen drags Ben along on a hike in search of the legendary Forgeti - a yeti that makes people forget they ever saw it - Ben is dubious.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 02: The Filth - EP2
programme.desc: Ben is tasked with cleaning the Rust Bucket but is soon tricked into letting the villainous and vile Fly Guys steal it.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 03: Clown College - EP3
programme.desc: While tailgating at a State U. homecoming football game, Ben teams up with Grandpa Max's old college buddies to keep the crazy clown Zombozo from robbing the stadium blind at halftime.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 04: The Ring Leader - EP4
programme.desc: While winning big on a Sumo Slammers video game, Ben gets the idea to win a real wrestling match - until an intimidating wrestler named Iron Kyle decides to make it a true challenge.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 05: Take 10 - EP5
programme.desc: While trying to film his own indie film, Ben accidentally lets the Bug Gang go free and when he takes the fight to their hidden lair, Ben has to take on their narcissistic leader - the Ant Queen.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 06: Ben 24hrs - EP6
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen attempt to stay up all night for Adrenaland but Ben fails to utilise his alien powers to stay awake and starts causing disaster after disaster.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 07: Freaky Gwen Ben - EP7
programme.desc: Ben interferes with malicious magician Hex's quest for the Titan Gloves at a flea market and accidentally switches bodies with Gwen, forcing him to walk a mile in her shoes and vice-versa!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 08: Rustbucket Rip - EP8
programme.desc: During a tour of historic Oldeville, Ben finds a rare Sumo Slammers card. When Billy Billions claims the same card, Ben has to battle Billy's high-tech drones which have hijacked the Rust Bucket!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 09: The Clocktopus - EP9
programme.desc: In a peaceful coastal town, Ben must not only face the archaic antagonist Steam Smythe and his latest creation - the Clocktopus - but also his deepest, darkest fear: squid!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 10: Growing Pains - EP10
programme.desc: During a stop at the superstore Shoppë, Ben and Gwen are transformed into babies by nanny-gone-nuts Nanny Nightmare, who will stop at nothing to reshape the world in the image of her day care.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 11: Villain Time - EP11
programme.desc: Ben must turn alien to save the Hoover Dam from disaster, but when tough guy hero Tim Buktu swoops in to "help", Ben must figure out if Tim is friend or foe.

programme.title: When Christmas Was Young

programme.title: Marcel The Shell With Shoes On
programme.desc: Marcel, an adorable sea snail who lives alone with his grandmother, seeks to find his lost community with the help of a documentary filmmaker.

programme.title: Ben 10: Ben Gen 10

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 11: Lumpus Vs. The Volcano - EP11
programme.desc: Lumpus angers a volcano when he won't give up his chicken pot pie.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 12: Nursemaster - EP12
programme.desc: Nurse Leslie leaves camp when he doesn't get the proper 'respect' he deserves.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 13: Dungs In Candyland - EP13

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 14: Tour Wars - EP14
programme.desc: Lazlo gives a tour of Camp Kidney but there's only one problem: Edward thinks the tour stinks!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 15: Lazlo's First Crush - EP15
programme.desc: Lazlo experiences his first love, but it rips the Jellies apart when Raj tells Lazlo, 'I love her too dude!'

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S3 07: These Boots Were Made For Walking - EP7
programme.desc: Meet Flapjack, a young boy who dreams of being a sea adventurer.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S3 08: Highlandlubber - EP8
programme.desc: Who wants to live forever? K'Nuckles does, especially after he meets an adventurer who tells him he's immortal.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S3 09: Who Let The Cats Out Of The Old Bag's House? - EP9
programme.desc: ...turns out it was Flapjack! Which is bad because they take over the town.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S3 10: Parfait Storm - EP10
programme.desc: Storm a brewin' in Stormalong? "Don't worry!", says K'Nuckles, "this happens every year."

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S3 11: K'nuckles Don't Be A Hero - EP11
programme.desc: K'Nuckles will stop at nothing to be a hero. Except maybe actually doing something heroic.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 07: Freaky Gwen Ben - EP7
programme.desc: Ben interferes with malicious magician Hex's quest for the Titan Gloves at a flea market and accidentally switches bodies with Gwen, forcing him to walk a mile in her shoes and vice-versa!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 08: Rustbucket Rip - EP8
programme.desc: During a tour of historic Oldeville, Ben finds a rare Sumo Slammers card. When Billy Billions claims the same card, Ben has to battle Billy's high-tech drones which have hijacked the Rust Bucket!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 09: The Clocktopus - EP9
programme.desc: In a peaceful coastal town, Ben must not only face the archaic antagonist Steam Smythe and his latest creation - the Clocktopus - but also his deepest, darkest fear: squid!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 10: Growing Pains - EP10
programme.desc: During a stop at the superstore Shoppë, Ben and Gwen are transformed into babies by nanny-gone-nuts Nanny Nightmare, who will stop at nothing to reshape the world in the image of her day care.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 11: Villain Time - EP11
programme.desc: Ben must turn alien to save the Hoover Dam from disaster, but when tough guy hero Tim Buktu swoops in to "help", Ben must figure out if Tim is friend or foe.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 50: Top Bugs - EP50
programme.desc: Bugs attends an MMA match and sees champion fighter Rhoda Roundhouse cheating. When he calls her out, she challenges him to a fight and the match is on.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 51: Slugsmoby - EP51
programme.desc: Viktor is a clown in The Pretentious Circus when his act is ruined by a critical onlooker, Daffy Duck. Daffy goes out of his way to show Viktor what he thinks a circus should be.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 52: Rhoda Rage - EP52
programme.desc: When a couple of kids get lost in the mall, Bugs entertains them with a strange and imaginative tale until their mom comes, drawing on things around them for inspiration.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 53: Good Duck To You, Cirque - EP53
programme.desc: Porky is determined to get his Halloween candy back from Daffy, who's hiding in a creep- looking house. But Daffy, and the house, have other plans.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 54: Then Things Got Weird - EP54
programme.desc: When Wile E. Coyote discovers that the secret behind AcmeInstant's instant delivery service is The Road Runner, he pulls out all the stops to try and capture him.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 55: Duck Duck Ghost - EP55
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian is planning an invasion of Earth, but decides he must study a typical Earthling before doing so. Unfortunately for him, the Earthling he chooses is Daffy Duck.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 56: Acme Instant - EP56
programme.desc: Leslie is jealous when Bugs is appointed the new Knight of Square Table, so he tries everything to take Bugs out and replace him.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 57: When Marvin Comes Martian In - EP57
programme.desc: Pepe Le Pew and Claudette are assigned the same mission in an art gallery. While Claudette keeps her eyes on the mission, Pepe keeps his eyes on Claudette.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 58: The Knight Time Is The Right Time - EP58
programme.desc: In this "mostly musical" episode, Bugs agrees to take care of Porky's two hamsters. He brings them home, and wakes up the next morning to find out that the hamsters have multiplied and taken over.

programme.title: The LEGO Batman Movie
programme.desc: Big changes are brewing in Gotham City and lone vigilante Batman may have to try to work with others to save the city from The Joker.

programme.title: 13 Going On 30
programme.desc: Jennifer Garner sheds her tough girl 'Alias' look to star in the hilarious comedy of a 13-year-old who wakes up one day and discovers that she's 30.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 16: Living La Vida Lumpus - EP16
programme.desc: Lumpus does the impossible! He convinces Lazlo that Camp Kidney is actually terrible!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 17: Samson's Mail Fraud - EP17
programme.desc: After getting laughed at by the other campers, Samson lies and tells them that he has a very famous and magical friend.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 18: The Haunted Coffee Table - EP18
programme.desc: Slinkman and Raj discover that there's something very creepy about Slinkman's coffee table -- BOO!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 19: Friendward - EP19
programme.desc: Edward attempts the unthinkable -- he tries to make a friend!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 20: Camp Dinkey - EP20
programme.desc: The campers daydream about 'Camp Dinkey,' believing that it is the perfect camp for them.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 21: Doting Doe-Eyed Deerest - EP21
programme.desc: Skip and Chip find a new 'Mom' -- and her name is Jane Doe!

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S3 12: Catch Me If You Candy - EP12
programme.desc: A candy bandit strikes! Everyone's a suspect! Well, not everyone, just K'Nuckles.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S3 13: Fish Out Of Water - EP13
programme.desc: Flapjack and K'Nuckles start drinking candy like a fish, and eventually turn into one; er...two.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 01: Several Leagues Under The Sea - EP1
programme.desc: Bragging don't bring nothing but trouble. Just ask Flapjack...wait, you can't, he's busy racing a crazy inventor!

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 02: Cammie Island - EP2
programme.desc: While looking for candy, Flapjack and K'nuckles accidentally end up on a mysterious island. And they are not alone.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 03: Several Leagues Above The Sea! - EP3
programme.desc: Up, up and a whale! The attention of a weird stranger has Bubbie's head in the clouds.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 12: Something I Ate - EP12
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max go on a tour of the impervious Fort Knox, but when Dr. Animo incites a hungry ani-mutate to attack the Fort, Ben must stop it before it gobbles up the nation's monetary standard!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 13: Don't Let The Bass Drop - EP13
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen are excited to attend an Earth Day EDM concert in Portland until the show is hijacked by the sound-manipulating baddy, Lord Decibel, who uses sound as a weapon to trash the planet.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 14: Cutting Corners - EP14
programme.desc: Ben approaches Geezer Bob about doing a little yard work to earn spending money and accidentally draws the ire of Bob's gnome-neighbours: the tiny, terrifyingly tenacious Billy-Bob Goblins.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 15: Animo Farm - EP15
programme.desc: Ben stumbles into Dr. Animo's secret lab - now ruled by his superior mutants, the Alphas - and must help the lesser animals escape while stuck as "Stinkfly".

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 16: Riding The Storm Out - EP16
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen's camping trip is interrupted by the emotionless Weatherheads. But a malfunctioning Omnitrix, firing out a mishmash of aliens, may not be the forecast for success.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 59: The Pepe Le Pew Affair - EP59
programme.desc: Bugs and Cecil each get half of the last dozen Potato Balls from a popular food truck. When they learn they're going to the same party, the race is on to see who can arrive with the snacks first.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 60: Hamsters - EP60
programme.desc: When Count BloodCount steals all the blood from the blood bank, Vampire Hunter Daffy Duck joins a frightened Porky Pig to get it back.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 61: Bugs Baked - EP61
programme.desc: Tad Tucker is filming an outdoor workout video. Bugs learns that part of Tad's fitness regimen involves eating an entire family of rabbits, so he seeks decides to teach Tad a lesson on camera.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 62: Vampire Me Love - EP62
programme.desc: With the threat of a snowy avalanche looming, it is up to Porky the Mountie to evacuate all the residents of the remote Canadian forest - unfortunately for him, Daffy is one of those residents.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 63: Tad Tucker Workout - EP63
programme.desc: Tad Tucker is filming an outdoor workout video. Bugs learns that part of Tad's fitness regimen involves eating an entire family of rabbits, so he seeks decides to teach Tad a lesson on camera.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 23: Edward's Big Bag - EP23
programme.desc: A Camping trip to a swamp turns odd when a mysterious sleeping-bag creature joins the activities.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S4 24: The List - EP24
programme.desc: Edward accidentally breaks Lazlo's ankle, and as a punishment is forced to perform Lazlo's long list of good deeds.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S5 01: Camp Complain - EP1
programme.desc: A task force to handle camp complaints is assembled among the campers by Slinkman. But can they separate their duties from the perks of their job?

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S5 03: Call Me Almondine - EP3
programme.desc: The annual Acorn Flats 'Wig-out' leaves Almondine pondering the real meaning of 'pretty'.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S5 04: Clam The Outlaw - EP4
programme.desc: A flapjack assault on Lumpus sends Clam into the hills as a wanted criminal, where the line is blurred between hero and outlaw.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 04: That's A Wrap! - EP4
programme.desc: Peppermint Larry enlists Flapjack and K'nuckles to help him find old candy wrappers.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 05: Looking For Love In All The Wrong Barrels - EP5
programme.desc: Love is in the eye of the beholder. Maybe K'nuckles needs glasses.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 06: Beard Buddies - EP6
programme.desc: Flapjack and K'nuckles get into a hairy adventure when they enter Peppermint Larry's annual 'Beard-Off'.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 07: Skooled - EP7
programme.desc: Flapjack thinks he's a dummy so K'nuckles takes him to school where they both have an adventure in learning.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 08: Snarked - EP8
programme.desc: Fearing that Bubbie has been abducted, Flapjack and K'nuckles go undercover aboard a mysterious foreign ship.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 17: Need For Speed - EP17
programme.desc: Touring Yellowstone, Ben uncovers a plot by the fast and furious LaGrange to find treasure buried below the national park. But with Old Faithful's help, Overflow is able to douse LaGrange's dreams.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 18: Brief Career Of Lucky Girl - EP18
programme.desc: When a wizard cosplayer gets his hands on a real, magical wand at Comic Con, Ben enlists Gwen to help stop Hex from retrieving it.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 19: Waterfilter - EP19
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max's trip to Niagara Falls is cut short by the horrid Hydromanders - creatures menacing them and their fellow tourists.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 20: Shhh! - EP20
programme.desc: While relaxing at a monastery with a no-noise policy, Ben can't keep quiet and accidentally awakens a dangerous dragon hidden in a secret chamber below the hallowed halls.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 21: Bright Lights, Black Hearts - EP21
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max stop by the graveyard set of Gwen's favourite TV show, The Unalivers. Before long, Ben discovers its lead, Michael Morningstar, is an energy vampire.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 68: Gettin' You Goat - EP68
programme.desc: Claudette and Pepe Le Pew are ordered to the moon to stop evil Elmer Blofudd from destroying the world. The mission will be completed if Claudette can keep Pepe's focus on Blofudd instead of on her.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 69: Spelunkheads - EP69
programme.desc: After exposure to Wile E. Coyote's invention, Tweety Bird has the power to transform into Monster Tweety. When Sylvester tries to make Tweety his lunch, he is terrorised by this new menacing beast.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 70: Loon-Raker - EP70
programme.desc: Bugs finds himself in Area 51, and meets an intelligent Martian baby named Mot. He decides to help the adorable alien escape, but first they must get through four-star general Yosemite Sam.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 71: Angry Bird - EP71
programme.desc: Porky is on trial for a minor violation, and is assigned Daffy Duck as an attorney. What could go wrong?

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 72: Area Fifty-Run - EP72
programme.desc: Tad Tucker is interviewed on the Shelley Lippa show in Sydney to talk about his lifestyle. When Bugs finds out that part of that lifestyle is eating rabbits, he decides to do make a fool out of Tad.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 73: Porker In The Court - EP73
programme.desc: After a plane crash, Porky and Daffy end up stranded on a deserted island together. Porky references a survival guide, while Daffy takes a more "wing it" approach.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 74: Tad The Skydiver - EP74
programme.desc: Elmer goes hunting for the title ingredient in his duck gumbo, but Daffy turns out to be not-so-cooperative prey.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 75: Duck Of The Flies - EP75
programme.desc: Rhoda Roundhouse wants to be the first to summit Mt. Killamesoftly, but with Bugs as her sherpa it's going to be more than your average uphill climb.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 76: Daffy In The Bayou - EP76
programme.desc: Porky's dream of a peaceful train ride is disrupted by fast talking, luggage-toting Petunia Pig.

programme.title: Big Miracle

programme.title: Christmas Carole

programme.title: San Andreas

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 68: Gettin' You Goat - EP68
programme.desc: Claudette and Pepe Le Pew are ordered to the moon to stop evil Elmer Blofudd from destroying the world. The mission will be completed if Claudette can keep Pepe's focus on Blofudd instead of on her.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 69: Spelunkheads - EP69
programme.desc: After exposure to Wile E. Coyote's invention, Tweety Bird has the power to transform into Monster Tweety. When Sylvester tries to make Tweety his lunch, he is terrorised by this new menacing beast.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 70: Loon-Raker - EP70
programme.desc: Bugs finds himself in Area 51, and meets an intelligent Martian baby named Mot. He decides to help the adorable alien escape, but first they must get through four-star general Yosemite Sam.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 71: Angry Bird - EP71
programme.desc: Porky is on trial for a minor violation, and is assigned Daffy Duck as an attorney. What could go wrong?

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 72: Area Fifty-Run - EP72
programme.desc: Tad Tucker is interviewed on the Shelley Lippa show in Sydney to talk about his lifestyle. When Bugs finds out that part of that lifestyle is eating rabbits, he decides to do make a fool out of Tad.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 73: Porker In The Court - EP73
programme.desc: After a plane crash, Porky and Daffy end up stranded on a deserted island together. Porky references a survival guide, while Daffy takes a more "wing it" approach.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 74: Tad The Skydiver - EP74
programme.desc: Elmer goes hunting for the title ingredient in his duck gumbo, but Daffy turns out to be not-so-cooperative prey.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 18: Brief Career Of Lucky Girl - EP18

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 20: Shhh! - EP20

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 22: Adventures In Babysitting - EP22
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max meet a family that appears to be a mirror image of them, but when Max goes off on a hike with their matriarch, Maxine, Ben is forced to babysit the bratty Simon Sez.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 80: Sir Littlechin And Th Phoenix - EP80

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa teaches George how to catch a ball, and later, they play Monkey in the Middle with Mummy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig is a little upset because he lost his glasses, so Peppa and George try to find them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George enjoy helping Grandpa Pig plant seeds in his garden.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: What's making the strange noises in the cave? Jonathan thinks it's a mermaid, but Paddington isn't so sure.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: NASA's Commander Megan is back! And she's taking Blaze and his friends to... Mars! But when Crusher accidently detaches the rocket ship's thrusters, it's up to Mars Rover Blaze to navigate Mars and get those thrusters back!

programme.title: Deer Squad
programme.desc: Kai has inventor's block during the annual inventor's competition! Scratch's invention malfunctions and creates a chaotic weather. // Sir Steel loves boba tea but he damages Professor Scratch's boba-making machine and floods the streets with pearls.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.desc: Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when it's raining – but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now he's more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when it's not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision – but that doesn't stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are joining the police department! With the help of their new police pal, Officer Anna, Blaze transforms into a super-fast police car to lend a helping hand (or tire) to any truck in trouble.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are excited to play with their new friend Roarian, the Flying Lion! But when Roarian loses his magical sunstone, he turns into a statue! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to find the sunstone and restore Roarian's powers!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Cap'n Turbot and turns the town upside-down in the process. // Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters. // As the squiddos prepare for Smoothie Day, William makes a new friend whose jokes are more hurtful than funny.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Baby Shark and William must travel to the deep dark depths to retrieve Baby's lost microphone.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: When things go missing in Windsor Gardens Jonathan believes a black hole is to blame, so Paddington goes on a space mission. // Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of a rainbow after they break Baaz's kaleidoscope.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing the Rainforest Ritmo. Boots has to learn the dance before they get there! // Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut that can turn into your favorite food.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: Deer Squad
programme.desc: Injured from training and eager to feel strong again, Rammy gets the squad to go in search of the legendary Crystal of Strength on Sparkle Island. // When Steel takes a pearl from a clam, it chases him through the city to try and get the pearl back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Rubble & Wild rescue animals from a giant runaway ball of yarn. // Skye and Rory rescue a painter hanging from a scaffold. // Marshall & Leo rescue animals stuck on a Ferris Wheel.// Everest and Shade rescue a baby mountain goat stuck in a crevasse.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Francois and Cap'n Turbot become stranded on a remote island, Ryder and the pups fly in to find and rescue the cousins.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The follow-up to "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" finds young wizard Harry Potter (Daniel Radcliffe) and his friends, Ron (Rupert Grint) and Hermione (Emma Watson), facing new challenges during their second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as they try to discover a dark force that is terrorizing the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry Potter's (Daniel Radcliffe) third year at Hogwarts starts off badly when he learns deranged killer Sirius Black (Gary Oldman) has escaped from Azkaban prison and is bent on murdering the teenage wizard. While Hermione's (Emma Watson) cat torments Ron's (Rupert Grint) sickly rat, causing a rift among the trio, a swarm of nasty Dementors is sent to protect the school from Black. A mysterious new teacher helps Harry learn to defend himself, but what is his secret tie to Sirius Black?

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The follow-up to "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" finds young wizard Harry Potter (Daniel Radcliffe) and his friends, Ron (Rupert Grint) and Hermione (Emma Watson), facing new challenges during their second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as they try to discover a dark force that is terrorizing the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry Potter's (Daniel Radcliffe) third year at Hogwarts starts off badly when he learns deranged killer Sirius Black (Gary Oldman) has escaped from Azkaban prison and is bent on murdering the teenage wizard. While Hermione's (Emma Watson) cat torments Ron's (Rupert Grint) sickly rat, causing a rift among the trio, a swarm of nasty Dementors is sent to protect the school from Black. A mysterious new teacher helps Harry learn to defend himself, but what is his secret tie to Sirius Black?

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: The fourth movie in the Harry Potter franchise sees Harry (Daniel Radcliffe) returning for his fourth year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, along with his friends, Ron (Rupert Grint) and Hermione (Emma Watson). There is an upcoming tournament between the three major schools of magic, with one participant selected from each school by the Goblet of Fire. When Harry's name is drawn, even though he is not eligible and is a fourth player, he must compete in the dangerous contest.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Now in his fifth year at Hogwarts, Harry (Daniel Radcliffe) learns that many in the wizarding community do not know the truth of his encounter with Lord Voldemort. Cornelius Fudge, minister of Magic, appoints his toady, Dolores Umbridge, as Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, for he fears that professor Dumbledore will take his job. But her teaching is deficient and her methods, cruel, so Harry prepares a group of students to defend the school against a rising tide of evil.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: As Death Eaters wreak havoc in both Muggle and Wizard worlds, Hogwarts is no longer a safe haven for students. Though Harry (Daniel Radcliffe) suspects there are new dangers lurking within the castle walls, Dumbledore is more intent than ever on preparing the young wizard for the final battle with Voldemort. Meanwhile, teenage hormones run rampant through Hogwarts, presenting a different sort of danger. Love may be in the air, but tragedy looms, and Hogwarts may never be the same again.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Without the guidance and protection of their professors, Harry (Daniel Radcliffe), Ron (Rupert Grint) and Hermione (Emma Watson) begin a mission to destroy the Horcruxes, the sources of Voldemort's immortality. Though they must rely on one another more than ever, dark forces threaten to tear them apart. Voldemort's Death Eaters have seized control of the Ministry of Magic and Hogwarts, and they are searching for Harry -- even as he and his friends prepare for the ultimate showdown.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: A clash between good and evil awaits as young Harry (Daniel Radcliffe), Ron (Rupert Grint) and Hermione (Emma Watson) prepare for a final battle against Lord Voldemort (Ralph Fiennes). Harry has grown into a steely lad on a mission to rid the world of evil. The friends must search for the Horcruxes that keep the dastardly wizard immortal. Harry and Voldemort meet at Hogwarts Castle for an epic showdown where the forces of darkness may finally meet their match.

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: When Tony Stark (Robert Downey Jr.) jump-starts a dormant peacekeeping program, things go terribly awry, forcing him, Thor (Chris Hemsworth), the Incredible Hulk (Mark Ruffalo) and the rest of the Avengers to reassemble. As the fate of Earth hangs in the balance, the team is put to the ultimate test as they battle Ultron, a technological terror hell-bent on human extinction. Along the way, they encounter two mysterious and powerful newcomers, Pietro and Wanda Maximoff.

programme.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
programme.desc: It is 1941 and the world is in the throes of war. Steve Rogers (Chris Evans) wants to do his part and join America's armed forces, but the military rejects him because of his small stature. Finally, Steve gets his chance when he is accepted into an experimental program that turns him into a supersoldier called Captain America. Joining forces with Bucky Barnes (Sebastian Stan) and Peggy Carter (Hayley Atwell), Captain America leads the fight against the Nazi-backed HYDRA organization.
